mapper.select: SELECT USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE, POINT, NICKNAME, DELMEM, GRADEPOINT FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{ userid } AND PASSWD = #{ passwd }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, POINT, NICKNAME ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL( MAX(USERCODE ), 0 ) + 1 FROM MEMBER), #{ userid }, #{ passwd }, #{ username }, #{ birthday }, #{ gender }, #{ grade }, #{ addr }, #{ email }, 500, #{ nickname } )
mapper.select: SELECT MANAGERCODE, MANAGER_PW, MANAGER_NAME, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE FROM MANAGER WHERE MANAGER_ID = #{ userid } AND MANAGER_PW = #{ passwd }
